section.title: sqlite3
SQLAlchemy
section.para: 创建链接引擎参考实例
section.programlisting:
from sqlalchemy import create_engine
engine = create_engine("postgresql://scott:tiger@localhost:5432/mydatabase")
engine = create_engine("mysql+mysqldb://scott:tiger@localhost/foo")
engine = create_engine("oracle://scott:tiger@127.0.0.1:1521/sidname")
engine = create_engine("mssql+pyodbc://mydsn")
# sqlite://<nohostname>/<path> # where <path> is relative: engine = create_engine("sqlite:///foo.db")
# or absolute, starting with a slash: engine = create_engine("sqlite:////absolute/path/to/foo.db")

section.title: 分批写入数据
section.para: DataFrame 结果集很大，写入时间过程很长，容易产生错误，这时可以使用 chunksize 切割数据，分批写入。
section.programlisting:
from sqlalchemy import create_engine import pandas as pd from pandas import DataFrame
engine = create_engine("sqlite:///:memory:")
data = DataFrame({ '姓名': ['张三', '李四', '王五'], '年龄': [11, 12, 13], '性别': ['Y', 'Y', 'N'] })
data.to_sql("data", engine, chunksize=1000)
table = pd.read_sql_query("SELECT * FROM data", engine) print(table)
